title: Stricter US state gun laws linked to safer high schools

title_detail.value: Stricter US state gun laws linked to safer high schools

summary: Adopting stricter state gun laws is linked to a safer school experience for students, a new study has found. Strengthening gun laws at state level was associated with teens being less likely to report being threatened or injured with a weapon at school, miss at least one day of school due to feeling unsafe, or to carry a weapon at any location.
